BattleCardAbility.Desc: [On Hit] Inflict 1 Bind and 1 Bleed next Scene
[On Hit] If user has Cycle, inflict 1 Feeble next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 2 Bind to each other next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Bind to each other next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Rupture
+1 Power if opponent has Bind
[On Hit] Inflict 2 Rupture; Inflict 1 Bind next Scene; Inflict 2 Bind to self next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 3 Rupture
[On Hit] Inflict 3 Rupture
[On Hit] Gain 1 Overheat next Scene
[On Hit] Gain 2 Overheat and Inflict 1 Overheat next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 2 Overheat next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Overheat next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Stagger Fragile next Scene
[On Clash Win] Take 3 Stagger damage
[On Clash Win] Inflict 1 Ink
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Ink
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Ink and 1 Paralysis next Scene
[On Clash Win] Inflict 1 Paralysis and Sinking next Scene
[On Clash Win] Inflict 2 Strangling Despair and 3 Sinking Count next Scene
This die rolls 0 if target has less than 3 Drowning [On Hit] Inflict 2 Sinking next Scene
This die rolls 0 if target has less than 5 Drowning [On Hit] Inflict 2 Sinking next Scene
This die rolls 0 if target has less than 10 Drowning [On Hit] Inflict 2 Sinking next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 2 Strangling Despair
[On Hit] Deal 7 Stagger Damage and inflict 2 Sinking and 1 Sinking Count to all other Librarians next Scene
[On Clash Win] Inflict 2 Sinking and 1 Sinking Count next Scene
[On Hit] Inflict 1 Drowning
[On Hit] 2 Sinking next Scene
[On Clash Win] Inflict 1 Drowning
[On Clash Win] Inflict 2 Sinking Count next Scene and 2 Drowning [On Clash Lose] Target loses 5 Drowning
This die loses 5 Power if target has less than 5 Drowning [On Hit] Inflict 3 Sinking and 1 Sinking Count next Scene
[On Hit] Recycle this die and inflict 2 Strangling Despair next Scene (Up to 3 times)
[On Clash Win] Inflict 3 Sinking and 2 Sinking Count next Scene and inflict 3 Drowning [On Clash Lose] Target loses 3 Drowning
[On Hit] Inflict 3 Drowning and play the Combat Page “Abyssal Frequency” against a random enemy [On Clash Lose] All Librarians lose 2 Drowning
If this attack fails to hit, all Librarians lose 3 Drowning and all Sinking Count [On Hit] Inflict 5 Sinking next Scene and 2 Drowning
[On Hit] Lose 2 Drowning and inflict 3 Drowning
If the attack fails to hit, take 100 Stagger damage and all Librarians lose 5 Drowning [On Hit] Lose 2 Drowning and inflict 3 Drowning
[On Hit] Inflict Drowning equal to target’s Drowning to all Librarians
